themes: need for transparent and well-defined evaluation criteria
importance of panelist representation and expertise
timeliness and predictability of funding processes
barriers faced by underrepresented artists and organizations
trust and cashflow challenges for marginalized communities
key_phrases: well-informed questions that consider artistic merit and value to the community
informed and attentive panelists who are representative of the communities who are applying
timeliness of award announcement and payouts
underrepresented artists, orgs, and communities often don't have the cashflow or established trust with the city
predictable/dependable times of year that opportunities open
barriers_identified: lack of timely award announcements and payouts
underrepresented artists, orgs, and communities lacking cashflow
lack of established trust with the city
solutions_proposed: use well-informed questions that consider artistic merit and community value
ensure panelists are informed, attentive, and representative of applicant communities
announce awards and provide payouts in a timely manner
establish predictable and dependable times of year for funding opportunities
